metadata.name: The Stars Align - Planetarium Notification
metadata.description:
[h1] How it works: [/h1]
When entering a new floor during a game, you will get the message "The stars align..." if a planetarium spawned in the floor
This mod not working in mod that add Planetarium in Greed Mode, the mod [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2748584047&searchtext=planetarium] [REP] Planetariums in Greed Mode [/url] has already include this function
